data.headline: 5 Statin Myths That Are Keeping You From Living Longer
data.subtitle: What the science actually says

data.myth: Statins cause muscle pain in everyone
data.truth: Only 5-10% experience muscle symptoms, and it's usually mild and reversible

data.myth: Once you start statins, you can never stop
data.truth: Statins can be stopped if lifestyle changes achieve target cholesterol levels

data.label: Reduction in Heart Attack Risk
data.context: For every 1 mmol/L reduction in LDL cholesterol

tips.text: Take your statin at the same time every day
Report any muscle symptoms to your doctor early
Combine with lifestyle changes for best results
